question: The main purpose of International Bank for Reconstruction (IBRD) is
option1: development of economics of members by facilitating investment of capital and foreign investment, through provision of loans
option2: promotes co-operation on technical matters of maritime safety, navigation and encourages anti-pollution measures
option3: attainment of the highest possible level of health by all people
answer: development of economics of members by facilitating investment of capital and foreign investment, through provision of loans
